1/ We heard yesterday about the 8-ish week interval between #COVID19 vaccine doses for the 5-11 yr cohort in Canada (details expected imminently).

This dose separation is associated with:
*Better immune responses
*Lower risk of myocarditis (unpublished/soon-to-be published data)

There is (understandably) a lot of hype over new therapeutics for #COVID19 as they are reported to reduce progression to severe illness if used in a timely manner.

Merk's molnupiravir data was released at @ASTMH (poster #2968) & looks pretty good. https://t.co/TxeiZoTEme
